alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 10 at 3:15PM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Western Windham and Bennington Counties in southern Vermont. * WHEN...From late Friday night through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could exceed an inch per hour late Saturday morning into the afternoon. Blowing and drifting snow could reduce visibility Saturday afternoon into Saturday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
